FuncDef: The reset pim control-message counters command deletes statistics about PIM control messages. The reset pim control-message counters command deletes statistics about PIM control messages.
CLIs: reset pim { vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | all-instance } control-messagecounters [ interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo: To re-collect statistics about PIM control messages, run the reset pim control-message counters command to delete existing statistics about PIM control messages.
